import React, { useState } from "react"; import background3 from "./pizz.png"; export default function Card() { const [active,setActive]=useState(false); const handleClick=()=>{ setActive(!active); } const posts = [ { title: "Title 1", img: `${background3}`, content: "react tailwind css card with image It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content", }, { title: "Title Grid 2", img: `${background3}`, content: "react tailwind css card with image It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content", }, { title: "Title Grid 3", img: `${background3}`, content: "react tailwind css card with image It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content", }, { title: "Title Grid 4", img: `${background3}`, content: "react tailwind css card with image It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content", }, ]; const [layout, setLayout] = React.useState(1); return ( <>
{posts.map((item, index) => (

{item.title}

11/1/19

{item.content}

Author Name

 Like
))}
); }
